Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists, with a fourth-quarter takeover that sealed the game for the Lakers.
The Kings fell short in the second game of their 2024-25 season, losing 131-127 on the road against the Los Angeles Lakers.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings fell short in Saturday's divisional matchup, but they had the game in their hands until they gave up a 21-0 run to start the fourth quarter.
Others: Domantas Sabonis and De'Aaron Fox praised LeBron James' performance.
